edu.uw.spl.broker

Class OrderManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uw.spl.broker.OrderManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.OrderManager

    public class OrderManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.uw.ext.framework.broker.OrderManager
    Implementation of an OrderManager which manages stop orders for a particular stock associated with this OrderManager
    Author:
    slajaunie
